description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              If we give you a keyboard and a monitor, dare you write a certain set of content that inspires thousands of people to follow what you want?
              

              Are you a master storyteller who can leads others with your words and voices?
              

              Are you a passionate youngster who dreams the infinity and are ready to work your tail off to succeed?
              

              If your answers are "yes", you are one step closer to your dream job. Don't hesitate to appy now to join VietnamWorks - the leading online recruitment company n Vietnam with the Content Marketing Executive position. You will be in charge of 2 main tasks: Content Communication and Marketing Collaterals:
              

              1. Content Communications
              
              -	Research insights of target audience
              
              -	Create content plan for communication campaigns for both jobseekers and employers
              
              -	Write email content/PR articles according to the plan
              

              2. Marketing Collaterals
              
              -	Create creative marketing materials such as sales brochure, posters, and sales message for VietnamWorks’ services (both in Vietnamese and English)
              
              -	Cooperate with design team to finalize creative ideas
              

              *** WHAT YOU GET FROM US:
              

              - Interesting Training: Presentation, Negotiation, Master Your Time - Master your Life,...
              
              - Various exciting Events: Company trip, Thanksgiving day, Year-end party, Happy Snack Time,..
              
              - Health Caring: Premium Health Care Package of Bao Viet Insurance, GYM/Yoga Sponsorship
              
              - Leave: 15 days of annual leave; 05 sick leave without doctor certificate, 06 urgent day off...
              
              - Salary review opportunity: 2 times/year
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              We would like to hear from those who:
              

              - Be proficient in writing email marketing, PR articles, and marketing collaterals (in both Vietnamese and English)
              
              - Can write for different target audience with suitable tone & mood
              
              - Have a logical mindset, meticulous and pay attention to details
              
              - Have good result in English Proficiency tests (IELTS, TOEFL, or SAT) is a plus
              
              - Have 1+ years of experience in content writing, copywriting, communications, marketing, or related fields. Experience working in agencies is a plus
              
              - Be ambitious, can do attitude
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
